verbs.description: Maine State Governor Paul LePage [V: is] joining a group of fellow governors who are backing President Donald Trump 's nomination for the Nobel Peace Prize .
[ARG0: Maine State Governor Paul LePage] is [V: joining] [ARG1: a group of fellow governors who are backing President Donald Trump 's nomination for the Nobel Peace Prize] .
Maine State Governor Paul LePage is joining a group of fellow governors who [V: are] backing President Donald Trump 's nomination for the Nobel Peace Prize .
Maine State Governor Paul LePage is joining a group of [ARG0: fellow governors] [R-ARG0: who] are [V: backing] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's nomination for the Nobel Peace Prize] .
